align.description_zh: flex 布局下的垂直对齐方式：top middle bottom

gutter.description: Raster spacing, which can be written as pixel values or with responsive object writing to set the horizontal spacing '{ xs: 8, sm: 16, md: 24}'. Or use the array form to set both '[horizontal spacing, vertical spacing]' ('supported after 1.5.0').
gutter.description_zh: 栅格间隔，可以写成像素值或支持响应式的对象写法来设置水平间隔 `{ xs: 8, sm: 16, md: 24}`。或者使用数组形式同时设置 `[水平间距, 垂直间距]`（`1.5.0 后支持`）。

type.description: Layout mode, optional flex, valid under modern browsers
type.description_zh: 布局模式，可选 flex，现代浏览器 下有效
